title: Leek and ham pasta
ingredients: ['4 leeks', 'olive oil', '2 knobs butter', '5 cloves garlic', 'few sprigs thyme', '1/2 glass white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste', '5-6 slices Parma or Prosciutto ham', '1 hardened bread cob', '150g mushrooms', '1 sprig rosemary', '300g fresh pappardelle or tagliatelle pasta', '600ml (1 pint) veg stock']
